dct_description_sm: Date of publication from Norwich. Map of Southern Africa and Madagascar; relief shown by hachures. At head of map: Pinkerton's modern atlas. Imprint of Historic Maps copy varies slightly from copy described by Norwich.
dct_publisher_sm: Philadelphia : Published by Bardford [i.e. Bradford] & Inskeep ; New York : Inskeep & Bradford ; Philadelphia : Moses Thomas, [1815]
